report-definition.name: Successful Framework Requests
Successful Framework Requests by Month and Year
report-definition.sql: select * from _1_request_statistics where month = {month} and year = {year};

report-definition.name: Item retrievals
report-definition.sql: select object_id as itemId, sum(requests) as itemRequests from _1_object_statistics where object_id = {object_id} and handler='ItemHandler' and request='retrieve' group by object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads per Item
report-definition.sql: select parent_object_id as itemId, sum(requests) as fileRequests from _1_object_statistics where parent_object_id = {object_id} and handler='ItemHandler' and request='retrieveContent' group by parent_object_id;

report-definition.name: File downloads
report-definition.sql: select object_id as fileId, sum(requests) as fileRequests from _1_object_statistics where object_id = {object_id} and handler='ItemHandler' and request='retrieveContent' group by object_id;

report-definition.name: Report Definition for Report Test
report-definition.sql: select page,year,sum(requests) as requests,sum(sessions) as sessions from _15_Report_Test group by page,year;

report-definition.name: Report Definition for Report Test1
report-definition.sql: select year,sum(requests) as requests from _15_Report_Test group by year;
